title: How to do accessible, inclusive recruitment
description: Harness the power of technology to support inclusive recruitment across your organisation. This course is part of a series during which AbilityNet's workplace inclusion experts will discuss the importance of embedding inclusivity at every stage of employee journey, starting with the recruitment process.
topics: Dos and don'ts of inclusive recruitment
Understanding the unintentional barriers we can create that reduce the pool of talent available to our organisations
Identifying areas for improvement in your own processes
Harness the power of technology in supporting inclusive recruitment
Implement immediate changes to help your recruitment processes cater to the widest audience
other_accessibility_support: A captioned recording with transcript will be shared with attendees after the live event
cost: Free or reduced fee for some
